sentences.sContent: Felicity (to Sally): I guess what I’m saying is this might all be a colossal mistake, as my dad would say, but on the other hand it may…maybe it’ll save my life or something.
sentences.sCn: 费利西蒂(对莎莉说): 我猜我想要说的这个可能是个巨大的错误，如同我爸爸说的那样，但是另一方面也许……也许它可拯救我的生命或者别的什么。

sentences.sContent: But watch out for a duck I call Sally.
sentences.sCn: 不过请注意一只被我叫做萨莉的鸭子。

synos.tran: 突围；[军]出击；（感情等）迸发；俏皮话；远足
